predicate.note: Frames file for 'magnify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. No comparison.

roleset.name: make greater or bigger

example.name: passivized
example.text: A spokesman for the Stamford, Conn. based company said operations had a loss of $5.5 million for the quarter; in addition, the loss was magnified *trace* by nonrecurring charges totaling $23.5 million and $8.2 million in asset-valuation adjustments that he described as ``unusual.''
example.arg: nonrecurring charges totaling $23.5 million and $8.2 million in asset-valuation adjustments that he described as ``unusual

roleset.note: It's possible, but unlikely, that this will be another quantifiable increase verb like 'rise', but be on the lookout for examples with EXT or start/end points.
